snippet: Serena Williams emphatically defeated Lucie Safarova, 6-0, 6-1, to win the final of the Family Circle Cup in 58 minutes on Sunday in Charleston, S.C.
abstract: Serena Williams emphatically defeats Lucie Safarova to win the Family Circle Cup tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams emphatically defeated Lucie Safarova, 6-0, 6-1, to win the final of the Family Circle Cup in 58 minutes on Sunday in Charleston, S.C.

headline.seo: Serena Williams Captures First Clay Title Since 2008
headline.main: Serena Williams Captures First Clay Title Since 2008
headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Captures First Clay Title Since 2008
